section.title: Introduction
section.para: This code is the deliverable 3.4 / 8.3 of the BioPreDyn project ("Integrated software suite implementing the methods and tools developed during this project in an interoperable, user-friendly and well-supported way.").
For more information about the development tasks related to the BioPreDyn project (and the content of the deliverable 3.4 / 8.3), please visit the developer's wiki.
For more information about the BioPreDyn project itself, please refer to the official project website .
